# Paris Design System
# https://paris.slingshot.fm
# https://github.com/slingshot/paris

> Paris is Slingshot's React design system for building consistent, accessible, and performant user interfaces. It works with both server and client components (RSC-compatible).

## Quick Facts

- Package: `paris` (npm)
- Framework: React 18+ with Next.js 14+ recommended
- Styling: SCSS modules with CSS variables (no CSS-in-JS)
- Theming: Light and dark themes via `pte` theme engine
- License: MIT

## Installation

```bash
pnpm add paris
# or npm install paris / yarn add paris
```

## Setup (Next.js)

1. Add to next.config.js:
```js
module.exports = {
    transpilePackages: ['paris'],
};
```

2. Set tsconfig moduleResolution to "bundler", "nodenext", or "node16"

3. In your root layout:
```tsx
import { generateCSS, theme } from 'paris/theme';
import 'paris/theme/global.scss';

<html>
  <head>
    <style id="pte-vars" dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: generateCSS(theme) }} />
  </head>
  <body className="paris-container">{children}</body>
</html>
```

## Usage

```tsx
import { Button } from 'paris/button';
import { Text } from 'paris/text';
import { Input } from 'paris/input';

<Text kind="headingSmall">Welcome</Text>
<Input label="Email" type="email" />
<Button kind="primary">Submit</Button>
```

## Components

### Layout
- Card - Content container
- CardButton - Interactive card
- Dialog - Modal dialog
- Drawer - Slide-out panel
- Popover - Floating content

### Forms
- Input - Text input (text, email, password, etc.)
- TextArea - Multi-line text
- Select - Dropdown/listbox/radio/segmented selection
- Checkbox - Checkbox with switch variant
- Combobox - Autocomplete input
- Field - Form field wrapper with label

### Navigation & Actions
- Button - Action trigger (primary/secondary/tertiary)
- StyledLink - Styled anchor
- Menu - Dropdown menu (MenuButton, MenuItems, MenuItem)
- Tabs - Tabbed navigation

### Display
- Text - Typography with theme styles
- Table - Data table
- Avatar - User avatar
- Tag - Label/badge
- Callout - Alert/notice
- Toast - Notifications
- Accordion - Collapsible content
- InformationalTooltip - Info tooltip

### Utilities
- Icon - Built-in icons (Close, ChevronLeft, ChevronRight, Check, etc.)
- Pagination - usePagination hook
- Tilt - 3D tilt effect
- VisuallyHidden, TextWhenString, RemoveFromDOM

## Theming

### Theme Variables (CSS)
```
--pte-new-colors-contentPrimary
--pte-new-colors-contentSecondary
--pte-new-colors-backgroundPrimary
--pte-new-colors-backgroundSecondary
--pte-new-typography-styles-paragraphMedium-fontSize
--pte-new-borders-radius-rounded
```

### In TypeScript
```tsx
import { pvar, pget, theme } from 'paris/theme';

pvar('new.colors.contentPrimary')  // Returns: var(--pte-new-colors-contentPrimary)
pget('new.colors.contentPrimary')  // Returns actual value
```

### Text Kinds
Display: displayLarge, displayMedium, display, displaySmall
Heading: headingLarge, headingMedium, headingSmall, headingXSmall, headingXXSmall
Label: labelXLarge, labelLarge, labelMedium, labelSmall, labelXSmall, labelXXSmall
Paragraph: paragraphLarge, paragraphMedium, paragraphSmall, paragraphXSmall, paragraphXXSmall

### Dark Theme
```tsx
import { DarkTheme, generateCSS } from 'paris/theme';
generateCSS(DarkTheme)
```

## Button Props

```tsx
kind?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary'  // default: 'primary'
size?: 'large' | 'medium' | 'small' | 'xs'   // default: 'large'
shape?: 'pill' | 'circle' | 'rectangle' | 'square'  // default: 'pill'
theme?: 'negative' | 'positive' | 'warning'
loading?: boolean
disabled?: boolean
startEnhancer?: ReactNode | (({ size }) => ReactNode)
endEnhancer?: ReactNode | (({ size }) => ReactNode)
href?: string  // Renders as anchor
```

## Input Props

```tsx
label: ReactNode  // Required for accessibility
status?: 'default' | 'error' | 'success'
type?: 'text' | 'email' | 'password' | 'number' | ...
placeholder?: string
startEnhancer?: Enhancer
endEnhancer?: Enhancer
description?: ReactNode
hideLabel?: boolean
disabled?: boolean
```

## Select Props

```tsx
options: { id: string, node: ReactNode, disabled?: boolean, metadata?: T }[]
value?: string | string[]
onChange?: (value) => void
kind?: 'listbox' | 'radio' | 'card' | 'segmented'  // default: 'listbox'
multiple?: boolean
label: ReactNode
```

## Dialog Props

```tsx
isOpen?: boolean
onClose?: (value: boolean) => void
title: ReactNode  // Required for accessibility
hideTitle?: boolean
hideCloseButton?: boolean
width?: 'compact' | 'default' | 'large' | 'full'
height?: 'content' | 'full'
appearance?: 'simple' | 'glass'
overlayStyle?: 'grey' | 'blur'
```

## Text Props

```tsx
kind?: keyof typography.styles  // default: 'paragraphMedium'
as?: 'p' | 'span' | 'div' | 'h1' | 'h2' | ...  // default: 'span'
weight?: 'thin' | 'light' | 'normal' | 'medium' | 'semibold' | 'bold' | ...
fontStyle?: 'normal' | 'italic'
color?: CSSColor
```

## Pattern: Overrides

Many components accept `overrides` prop for customization:
```tsx
<Input
  label="Email"
  overrides={{
    container: { className: 'custom-container' },
    label: { kind: 'labelSmall' },
  }}
/>
```

## Pattern: Enhancers

For icons in buttons/inputs:
```tsx
import { Icon, ArrowRight } from 'paris/icon';

<Button endEnhancer={<Icon icon={ArrowRight} size={12} />}>
  Continue
</Button>

// Or with size callback
<Button endEnhancer={({ size }) => <Icon icon={ArrowRight} size={size} />}>
  Continue
</Button>
```
